title: wolfSSL
extract: wolfSSL is a small, portable, embedded SSL/TLS library targeted for use by embedded systems developers. ... It includes SSL/TLS client libraries and an SSL/TLS server implementation as well as support for multiple APIs, including those defined by SSL and TLS.
extract_html: wolfSSL is a small, portable, embedded SSL/TLS library targeted for use by embedded systems developers. ... It includes SSL/TLS client libraries and an SSL/TLS server implementation as well as support for multiple APIs, including those defined by SSL and TLS.
